name: ImmGen ATAC Presentation
tagline: Presented by Caleb Lareau in the Buenrostro Lab
body:
## About
Presentation given by [Caleb Lareau](https://caleblareau.github.io) in the [Buenrostro Lab](https://buenrostrolab.com) on December 9, 2016. 

## We hope you enjoyed the talk! 
[Slides]() are available here

## Want to interact with the data?
*Some of these pages may take a moment to load*
- Here's a [2D representation of the samples](https://cdn.rawgit.com/buenrostrolab/ImmGen/master/code/networkStuff.html) with select transcription factor deviation scores noted. 
- The sample-sample [correlation heatmaps](https://cdn.rawgit.com/buenrostrolab/ImmGen/master/code/sampleCors.html) canbe found here. 
- You can visualize the data in a [UCSC browser instance](http://rstats.immgen.org/Chromatin/chromatin.html).

## Acknowledgements
We are grateful to Hideyuki Yoshida, Sara Mostafavi, Christophe Benoist, and the members of the ImmGen ATAC working consortium.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
